name: UNOS_CLIN_INFO_2
description: Additional information reported to the United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) for each of the registry records or forms.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: UNOS_SEC_DX_C_NAME
columns.description: Transplant patient's secondary diagnosis.
entries: AHN: Other, Specify (e.g., Acute Viral Infection, Autoimmune Hepatitis - Fulminant)
Cirrhosis: Chronic Active Hepatitis: Etiology Unknown
Cirrhosis: Other, Specify (e.g., Histiocytosis, Sarcoidosis, Granulomatous)
Acute Alcohol-Associated Hepatitis With or Without Cirrhosis
Alcohol-Associated Cirrhosis Without Acute Alcohol-Associated Hepatitis
Biliary Hypoplasia: Nonsyndromic Paucity of Intrahepatic Bile Duct
Biliary Hypoplasia: Alagille's Syndrome (Paucity of Intrahepatic Bile Duct)
Biliary Atresia or Hypoplasia: Other, Specify
Metdis: Wilson's Disease, Other Copper Metabolism Disorder
Metdis: Glyc Stor Dis Type I (GSD-I)
Metdis: Glyc Stor Dis Type IV (GSD-IV)
PLM: Other, Specify (i.e., Klatzkin Tumor, Leiomysarcoma)
Bile Duct Cancer: (Cholangioma, Biliary Tract Carcinoma)
Graft vs. Host Dis Sec to Non-Liver Txp

columns.name: UNOS_SEC_DX_OTH
columns.description: Free text description of transplant patient's the secondary diagnosis.

columns.name: UNOS_PULM_EMB_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the candidate was diagnosed with a pulmonary embolism within the past six months.

columns.name: UNOS_VARICES_BLD_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the candidate was experiencing bleeding from varices present in the esophagus and/or stomach within two weeks prior to listing.

columns.name: UNOS_LVR_SURG_PX_C_NAME
columns.description: The surgical procedure type used for liver transplant.

columns.name: UNOS_LVR_PROC_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: The procedure used for liver transplant.
entries: Partial Liver, Remainder Not TXP or Living Transplant

columns.name: UNOS_LVR_SPLT_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: The split type used for liver transplant.
entries: Right Lobe without Middle Hepatic Vein (seg 5,6,7,8)
Right Lobe with Middle Hepatic Vein (seg 4,5,6,7,8)
New Left Lobe with Caudate in Situ (seg 1,2,3,4)
New Left Lobe with Caudate on the Bench (seg 1,2,3,4)
Left Lateral Segment on the Bench (seg 2,3)
Right Lobe without Middle Hepatic Vein in Situ (seg 5,6,7,8)
Right Lobe without Middle Hepatic Vein on the Bench (seg 5,6,7,8)
Right Lobe with Middle Hepatic Vein in Situ (seg 4,5,6,7,8)
Right Lobe with Middle Hepatic Vein on the Bench (seg 4,5,6,7,8)
Right Trisegment with Middle Hepatic Vein (seg 1,4,5,6)
Left Lobe with Caudate in Situ (seg 1,2,3,4)
Left Lobe with Caudate on the Bench (seg 1,2,3,4)

columns.name: UNOS_LVR_5_PRBC_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the recipient received five or more units of packed red blood cells within 48 hours prior to transplantation due to spontaneous hypertensive bleeding.

columns.name: UNOS_LVR_BCTRL_PT_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the recipient was experiencing bacterial peritonitis.

columns.name: UNOS_LVR_ABDO_SUR_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the recipient had abdominal surgery prior to transplant.

columns.name: UNOS_LVR_PVT_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the recipient experienced portal vein thrombosis prior to transplant.

columns.name: UNOS_LVR_TIPSS_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the recipient required TIPSS (transjugular intrahepatic portosystemic shunt) prior to transplant.

columns.name: UNOS_LVR_TUM_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of incidental tumor found at the time of transplant.

columns.name: UNOS_WARM_ISCH_TM
columns.description: The total warm ischemia time for the liver, in minutes.

columns.name: UNOS_WARM_ISCH_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: If the total warm ischemia time is unavailable for the liver, this indicates why the information is unavailable.

columns.name: UNOS_COLD_ISCH_TM
columns.description: The total cold ischemia time for the liver, in hours. If a pump is used, this includes pump time.

columns.name: UNOS_COLD_ISCH_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: If the total cold ischemia time is unavailable for the liver, this indicates why the information is unavailable.

columns.name: UNOS_LF_SPT_ECMO_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient was on an extracorporeal membrane oxygenation machine for life support at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_LF_SPT_AORP_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient was on an intra-aortic balloon pump device for life support at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_LF_SPT_PRINF_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is on a prostacyclin infusion for life support at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_LF_SPT_PRINH_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is on a prostacyclin inhalation machine for life support at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_LF_SPT_INHNO_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is receiving inhaled nitric oxide for life support at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_LF_SPT_VAD_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is using a ventricular assist device at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_LF_SPT_VADB1_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the brand of the first ventricular assist device used by the patient at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_LF_SPT_VADB2_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the brand of a second ventricular assist device used by the patient at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_LF_SPT_VAD1S
columns.description: The brand name of the first ventricular assist device being used if the brand is not in the UNOS-defined table

columns.name: UNOS_LF_SPT_VAD2S
columns.description: The brand name of the second ventricular assist device being used if the brand is not in the UNOS-defined table

columns.name: UNOS_ANG_THOR_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the thoracic transplant patient's angina status at the time of UNOS registration
entries: Stable Angina - Strenuous Activity Results in Angina
Stable Angina - Ordinary Physical Activity Results in Angina
Stable Angina - No Rest Angina; Does Have Angina with Less than Ordinary Activity
Stable Angina - Angina with Any Physical Activity or At Rest

columns.name: UNOS_SDEATH_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is at risk of sudden death at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_AMIOD_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is on an amiodarone medication at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_DEFIB_IMP_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient has an implantable defibrillator at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_IV_INFECT_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient had an infection requiring IV drug therapy within the 2 weeks prior to the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_EX_O2
columns.description: The amount of oxygen consumed during exercise (ml/min/kg) at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_EX_O2_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason there is no value for exercise oxygen consumption at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_FVC
columns.description: The patient's forced vital capacity (% predicted) at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_FVC_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason there is no value for forced vital capacity at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_PCO2
columns.description: The patient's partial pressure of carbon dioxide (mm/Hg) at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_PCO2_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason there is no value for carbon dioxide partial pressure at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_PUL_SEPS_IV_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient experienced at least two pulmonary sepsis episodes treated by IV medications at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_CORT_DEP_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is dependent on at least 5 mg/day of corticosteroids at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_SIX_MIN_WALK
columns.description: The number of feet the patient is able to walk in 6 minutes at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_PNRES_LNG_BC_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient suffers from a pan-resistant bacterial lung at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_CARD_SURG_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient has undergone any non-transplant cardiac surgery prior to UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_CARD_SURG_S
columns.description: Description of a cardiac surgery the patient has undergone prior to UNOS registration that is not on the UNOS-defined category list

columns.name: UNOS_LUNG_SURG_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient has undergone any non-transplant lung surgery prior to UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_LUNG_SURG_S
columns.description: Description of a lung surgery the patient has undergone prior to UNOS registration that is not on the UNOS-defined category list

columns.name: UNOS_IV_INOTROPES_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is on intravenous inotropes for life support at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_THOR_SURG_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the pediatric the patient has undergone any non-transplant thoracic surgery prior to UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_STERNO_C_NAME
columns.description: The number of sternotomies the patient has undergone prior to UNOS registration
entries: Unknown If There Were Prior Sternotomies

columns.name: UNOS_THORAC_C_NAME
columns.description: The number of thoracotomies the patient has undergone prior to UNOS registration
entries: Unknown If There Were Prior Thoracotomies

columns.name: UNOS_CONGEN_CARD_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient has undergone surgery for a congenital cardiac condition prior to UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_PALLIA_SURG_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient has undergone palliative surgery prior to UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_CORR_SURG_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient has undergone corrective surgery prior to UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_SING_VENT_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient has undergone surgery for a single ventricular prior to UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_FEV1FVC
columns.description: The ratio of forced expiratory volume in one second to forced vital capacity at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_FEV1FVC_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason there is no value for the ratio of forced expiratory volume in one second to forced vital capacity at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_ANTI_ARRYTH_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is on an antiarrythmic agent at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_CRDO
columns.description: The cardiac output of the patient (L/min) at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_CRDO_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason there is no value for cardiac output at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_CRDO_INOVAS_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient was on inotropes or vasodilators that affected the cardiac output reading

columns.name: UNOS_PCW_AVG
columns.description: The average pulmonary capillary wedge pressure (mm/Hg) at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_PCW_AVG_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason there is no value for the average pulmonary capillary wedge pressure at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_PCW_AVG_INV_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient was on inotropes or vasodilators that affected the average pulmonary capillary wedge pressure reading

columns.name: UNOS_PA_SYS
columns.description: The systolic blood pressure of the patient's pulmonary artery (mm/Hg) at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_PA_SYS_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason there is no value for the pulmonary artery systolic blood pressure at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_PA_SYS_INOV_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient was on inotropes or vasodilators that affected the pulmonary artery systolic blood pressure reading

columns.name: UNOS_PA_DIA
columns.description: The diastolic blood pressure of the patient's pulmonary artery (mm/Hg) at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_PA_DIA_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason there is no value for the pulmonary artery diastolic blood pressure at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_PA_DIA_INOV_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient was on inotropes or vasodilators that affected the pulmonary artery diastolic blood pressure reading

columns.name: UNOS_PA_AVG
columns.description: The average blood pressure of the patient's pulmonary artery (mm/Hg) at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_PA_AVG_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason there is no value for the average pulmonary artery blood pressure at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_PA_AVG_INVS_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient was on inotropes or vasodilators that affected the average pulmonary artery blood pressure reading

columns.name: UNOS_LF_SPT_PGLAN_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient was on an prostaglandins for life support at the time of UNOS registration

columns.name: UNOS_TITER_A_C_NAME
columns.description: The current A titer value If the recipient's ABO blood-type is B or O.

columns.name: UNOS_TITER_B_C_NAME
columns.description: The current B titer value If the recipient's ABO blood-type is A or O.

columns.name: HX_OF_HCC_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient ever had a diagnosis of HCC.

columns.name: NEOADJUVANT_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient received neoadjuvant therapy.

columns.name: CMV_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the patient's CMV status.

columns.name: UNOS_HBV_SURFACE_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's HBV surface antibody total results.

columns.name: UNOS_OPO
columns.description: The OPO that recovered the organ.

columns.name: UNOS_RIGHT_RESIST
columns.description: The final resistance at the time of transplant for the right kidney.

columns.name: UNOS_R_F_TXP_RSTN_C_NAME
columns.description: If the final resistance level is unavailable, this indicates why the information is unavailable.

columns.name: UNOS_R_FIN_FLOW_RT
columns.description: If a pump was used, the final flow rate for the right kidney.

columns.name: UNOS_R_FN_FLOW_RT_C_NAME
columns.description: If the final flow rate is unavailable, this indicates why the information is unavailable.

columns.name: UNOS_DIFF_CHOLANG_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the organ failed due to diffuse cholangiopathy.

columns.name: ER_URGENT_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the patient was admitted to the ER or Urgent care during the follow-up period related to the transplant.

columns.name: CREAT_DT
columns.description: Stores the date the patient's most recent creatinine test was drawn.

columns.name: SYS_BP_DT
columns.description: The date that the patient's systolic blood pressure was read.

columns.name: DIA_BP_DT
columns.description: The date that the patient's diastolic blood pressure was read.

columns.name: CNTRY_RESIDENCE_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's country of permanent residence.

columns.name: YR_OF_ENTRY_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: Reason the year of entry to the US is missing.

columns.name: INSURANCE_LOSS_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the patient has lost insurance coverage due to the donation.

columns.name: UNOS_HEIGHT_DATE
columns.description: The date the patient's height was measured.

columns.name: UNOS_WEIGHT_DATE
columns.description: The date the patient's weight was measured.

columns.name: UNOS_HEP_B_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate if the patient receive a hepatitis B vaccine.

columns.name: UNOS_NO_HEPB_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the reason the patient has not received a hepatitis B vaccine.

columns.name: UNOS_NO_HEPB_RSN_OTHR
columns.description: Indicates the free-text reason the patient has not received a hepatitis B vaccine.
